attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: make alteration to existing law, to create a penalty for anyone who deliberately, by way of neglect of their responsibility, and whereby then creates a death, should receive maximum lifetime penalty (no reprieve) and in the case of more than one life "penalty" to receive a death sentence instead of lifetime sentence in an institution ie the penalty is to forfeit their own life.  the intention to create a harsher penalty than exists with the intention to reduce crime and cost to taxpayer

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
